channel.title: Comments on: The Ems â€” 321 South Olive

item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.description:
<img src="https://farm4.static.flickr.com/3600/3292798311_b299d75cbf_o.gif" alt="emsandfriends" height="376" width="575" />
The Ems between the Casa Alta and the turreted house at 327 S Olive. As mentioned above, 327 is demo'd in 1948, so makes our late-30s model, but doesn't make the 1950 Sanborn map.
The BPOE Lodge (actually a Moose Lodge when this model was built) across the street.
The Lovejoy and the Nugent at Third and Grand, upper left.
item.content:encoded:
The Ems between the Casa Alta and the turreted house at 327 S Olive. As mentioned above, 327 is demo’d in 1948, so makes our late-30s model, but doesn’t make the 1950 Sanborn map.

The BPOE Lodge (actually a Moose Lodge when this model was built) across the street.

The Lovejoy and the Nugent at Third and Grand, upper left.
